thread.title_full: Temporary road closing in Tega Cay needed to begin work on Hubert Graham Way connector

author:

title: Temporary road closing in Tega Cay needed to begin work on Hubert Graham Way connector
text:
Temporary road closing in Tega Cay needed to begin work on Hubert Graham Way connector 
Dam Road is temporary detour 
Construction on Hubert Graham Way begins Oct. 26 Part of Stonecrest Boulevard will be closed to through traffic beginning Oct. 26 as work begins on the Hubert Graham Way connector road. Michael Harrison i 
Stonecrest Boulevard will be closed to through traffic beginning Oct. 26, at its Hubert Graham Way intersection. 
Charlie Funderburk, city manager for Tega Cay, emailed a message Wednesday morning. 
“Traffic will need to detour around this area using Dam Road,” it read. 
“Construction crews building Hubert Graham Way will be beginning the relocation of utilities and installation of the roundabout as part of the overall project.” 
The current schedule has the intersection closed until March. 
“As the schedule is updated by York County and their construction crew, we will post the information on our city website and on social media,” reads the notice. 
Check back for more.
